message: My app prod_hh stopped working about 10 minutes ago based on my alert.

ep.io: Unknown app

There is no app at this address. Perhaps the owner renamed it or it is misspelled.
@citadelgrad somethings wonky,  I came across this for one of my apps also ... ep.io control panel is a bit slow also
@rasiel I figured they were probably asleep. In London, its almost 5AM.
@rasiel  Yeah all my other apps work fine and this is my important one. ugh! At least its late a night.
@citadelgrad Andrew will probably have it fixed soon, its probably affecting only one of the servers
I've been having problems with the control panel being very slow (and sometimes timing out) and with unknown app's for at least the last 3 hours or os.
Looks like it is intermittent, only 1 of my 3 apps is having any issues (the oldest of the three)
Currently even http://ep.io/ itself is throwing the "Unknown app" error
both the control panel and some of my apps are down here as well... ouch! i was going with the "were running it as a production environment" line.
yea I'm getting unknown app as well
Yes, we're down, and our nagios failed in such a way that neither it nor its monitor texted us
Alright, everything's back up. Our apologies for this outage - we already have a backend version without this issue, but it won't be deployed until next week.
Is it me or something still seems to be wrong with Redis?
@joonathan Something is, we're still trying to track it down
(unfortunately, we had an investor meeting in the middle of the day)
Yes, trust me, we're working as fast as we can to get it to a point where we can use our payment code
no, i didn't i just re-uploaded ... should i recreate?
if you can, yes

great thanks, and while I know the service is in Beta, I think you guys should start chargin, me for one, am ready to plunk down my credit card. If it it will help you hire some help or move things faster ... I"m all for it.  ep.io has already made my life easier, even if still in Beta

one of my apps ceibelize is still having issues, i noticed the code i had deployed was gone, so i redeployed, it was suspended (not by me, so probably by you guys), I re-enabled but its giving a db error, does it mean my db is gone and i have to re-do also? just curious
yeah - did you do the delete-and-recreate trick?
otherwise, we can dig through the backups and find your dump, but it's a time-consuming process
@rasiel When did you last modify the app? Ones that were modified since about midday yesterday (UK time) have lost their ID mapping
also, which db - postgres or redis?
yes, i modified yesterday, so that must be it, it was a postgres db
I'll re-do the db, no big deal
we do want your money, honest.
@andrewgodwin any luck with the redis issue? I still seem to get some interesting redis dispatcher errors — "Internal error in Redis dispatcher"
I have the dispatcher errors with redis too.
It should be working now, four or five apps I tested are all fine
@joonathan Ah, I though I fixed that yesterday, let me look into it again
